title: HashPig — Parallel Hasher & Integrity Guardian
blurb: Lightning-fast multi-algorithm hashing for folders, drops, and pipelines — with verifiable manifests.
description: HashPig provides a fast, parallel hashing workflow for desktop and server environments. It supports BLAKE3/SHA-256/SHA-512/xxHash, adaptive chunking, SRI generation, JSONL/CSV manifests, and a verify mode for reproducible integrity checks. Use it via drag-and-drop UI, CLI, or as a library in CI/CD.
